page.title: 07LIFESTYLES
page.content: LIFESTYLES BETWEEN THE DIFFERENT PARTS OF OUR AREA VARIES FROM AVERAGE TO POSH LIFESTYLES.IN DRUMCHAPEL THE LIFE STYLE IS USUALLY THE AVERAGE STYLE BUT IN BEARSDEN MANY OF THE PEOPLE ARE REGARDED AS POSH. THE STYLES PEOPLE LIVE IN ARE DECIDED IF THEY HAVE JOBS OR NOT.MANY PEOPLE IN BEARSDEN HAVE JOBS IN OFFICES ETC.BUT IN DRUMCHAPEL 41% OF ITS POPULATION ARE UNEMPLOYED.THIS SHOWS HOW MANY PEOPLE TOOK INTEREST IN EDUCATION.IN THE KNIGHTSWOOD-TEMPLE AREA THE LIFESTYLE IS ALSO AVERAGE. PEOPLE IN BEARSDEN HAVE MANY LUXURIES IE:CARS,VIDEOS ETC. BUT IN DRUMCHAPEL ONLY A FEW PEOPLE CAN AFFORD CARS BUT VIDEOS ARE BECOMING MORE POPULAR.
